author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Amanda Bynes is finally off probation after her 2014 DUI | Daily Mail Online

organizations.name: fashion institute of design and merchandising

text: 57 shares She failed multiple sobriety tests and was later arrested for DUI. Adderall is a stimulant and according to TMZ Amanda was 'out of it' when she was stopped. Bad times: She was arrested for driving under the influence Adderall in 2014, she had taken the drug before getting stopped in Van Nuys Uh oh: She failed multiple sobriety tests and was later arrested for DUI During this time the young actress was smoking a lot of weed and was also off her anti-psychotic medication for Schizophrenia and bipolarity. Meanwhile, things might finally be looking up for the former child actress. She is currently attending the Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising in Los Angeles. In trouble: Adderall is a stimulant and according to TMZ Amanda was 'out of it' when she was stopped Things are looking up: She is currently attending the Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising in Los Angeles The blonde actress is also working on a fashion line that she plans to debut later this year. Her attorney Tamar Arminak spoke to ABC last year and revealed she's doing great: 'She is happy and healthy, and doing great at school. 'She is focusing on her very own fashion line which is shaping up to be amazing,' Arminak said. Read more:
